faqs.question: What is psychedelic clothing?
faqs.answer: Psychedelic clothing features vibrant, trippy, and often colorful designs inspired by the art and culture of the psychedelic movement. These designs often include surreal patterns, tie-dye, and bold prints.

faqs.question: What sizes do you offer?
faqs.answer: Our clothing ranges from XS to XXL. Please check our size chart on each product page to find your perfect fit.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. Shipping costs and delivery times depend on your location.

faqs.question: How should I care for my psychedelic clothing?
faqs.answer: We recommend hand washing or using a gentle machine cycle with cold water. Avoid harsh detergents and air dry to maintain the vibrancy of the designs.

faqs.question: Are your products eco-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, we prioritize sustainability by using eco-friendly materials and dyes wherever possible.

faqs.question: Can I return or exchange an item?
faqs.answer: Yes, returns or exchanges are accepted within 30 days of purchase, provided the item is in its original condition. Check our return policy for more details.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other major payment methods. For a full list, see our payment options page.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom designs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can create custom psychedelic clothing for bulk orders or special events. Contact us for more details!

faqs.question: What materials are used in your clothing?
faqs.answer: Our clothing is made with high-quality materials like organic cotton, bamboo, and recycled polyester, ensuring comfort and durability.

faqs.question: What sizes are available for this product?
faqs.answer: You can select from the available sizes displayed under the 'Size Options.' Sizes with no stock will be disabled.

faqs.question: How do I check the price of a specific size?
faqs.answer: Click on a size in the 'Size Options' section to view its price and stock details.

faqs.question: Why is the price crossed out?
faqs.answer: The original price is crossed out when there's a discount or offer price available. The discounted price is displayed in bold.

faqs.question: How can I view the product images in detail?
faqs.answer: Click on any image in the product gallery to view it in a larger size. You can also zoom in by hovering over the image.

faqs.question: Why are there multiple images of the same product?
faqs.answer: Each image shows the product from different angles or with different styling to help you make an informed decision.

faqs.question: What does 'Only X left in stock' mean?
faqs.answer: This message indicates that the stock for a specific size or variant is running low. Act quickly to ensure you don’t miss out.

faqs.question: Can I purchase out-of-stock items?
faqs.answer: No, sizes with no stock will be disabled, and you cannot add them to the cart.

faqs.question: How do I add a product to the cart?
faqs.answer: Select a size, choose the quantity, and click on the 'Add to Cart' button.

faqs.question: Why can’t I add the product to the cart?
faqs.answer: Ensure you’ve selected an available size and a valid quantity before attempting to add the product to your cart.

faqs.question: How do I increase or decrease the quantity in the cart?
faqs.answer: Use the '+' or '-' buttons next to the quantity box to adjust the number of items before adding to the cart.

faqs.question: How do I add a product to my wishlist?
faqs.answer: Click on the heart icon next to the product. The icon will turn solid if the product is added successfully.

faqs.question: How can I remove an item from my wishlist?
faqs.answer: Click the heart icon again. The icon will turn back to its outline state.

faqs.question: Why is my wishlist empty?
faqs.answer: Ensure you’re logged into your account and have added items to your wishlist.

faqs.question: What are related products?
faqs.answer: These are items similar to the product you're viewing, based on category, features, or popularity.

faqs.question: Why are no related products displayed?
faqs.answer: If no related items are found, a message will be displayed with an option to explore the shop.

faqs.question: Can I add related products to my wishlist directly?
faqs.answer: Yes, click on the heart icon for any related product to add it to your wishlist.

faqs.question: How do I use the chat feature?
faqs.answer: Type your message in the input box labeled 'Chat with Gemini AI' and click the 'Send' button.

faqs.question: What can I ask the AI?
faqs.answer: You can inquire about product details, size availability, or even get styling suggestions for the product.

faqs.question: Why is the chat not responding?
faqs.answer: Ensure your internet connection is stable. If the issue persists, refresh the page or try again later.

faqs.question: Why are some sizes grayed out?
faqs.answer: Sizes that are out of stock will appear disabled and cannot be selected.

faqs.question: Why is the zoom-in icon not working?
faqs.answer: Check if the JavaScript for the zoom functionality is properly loaded. Refresh the page and try again.

faqs.question: Can I view the product prices in other currencies?
faqs.answer: Currently, prices are displayed in INR (₹). we will add that feature in near future

faqs.question: How do I return to the shop page?
faqs.answer: Use the 'Explore More Products' button at the bottom of the 'Related Products' section.
